sentences.en: After many trials and tribulations, we finally reached our destination.
sentences.cn: 经过了许多考验和磨难之后, 我们终于到达了目的地.

sentences.en: Ellis Island has become one of America's most popular tourist destinations.
sentences.cn: 埃利斯岛已经成为美国最受欢迎的游览地之一。

sentences.en: His destination was Chobham Common, a long way from his Cotswold home.
sentences.cn: 他的目的地是乔伯姆公地，那里和他在科茨沃尔德的家离得很远。

sentences.en: I eventually arrived at my destination.
Life can be likened to a journey with an unknown destination.
sentences.cn: 生活可以被比作一次不知目的的旅行.

sentences.en: Only half of the emergency supplies have reached their destination.
sentences.cn: 仅有一半的紧急救援物资运抵了目的地。

sentences.en: Spain is still our most popular holiday destination.
sentences.cn: 西班牙仍是我们最喜爱的度假去处。

sentences.en: Spain was cited as the most popular holiday destination.
sentences.cn: 西班牙被列为最受欢迎的度假胜地。

sentences.en: The destination of his study is the law.
The rider spurred on / forward to his destination.
sentences.cn: 骑者向目的地疾驰而去.

sentences.en: The tension grew in inverse proportion to the distance from their final destination.
sentences.cn: 拉力的大小与他们离终点的距离成反比。

sentences.en: The troops rushed to their destination without a single halt.
sentences.cn: 部队马不停蹄地赶到了目的地.

sentences.en: They encountered untold difficulties and dangers before they reached their destination.
sentences.cn: 他们经历过数不尽的艰难险阻才到达目的地.

sentences.en: They were flown to the destination.
To find out, make Christchurch your next vacation destination.
sentences.cn: 找找看, 明年的暑假新西兰基督城是你旅游的目标.

sentences.en: You can check your baggage right through to its final destination.
sentences.cn: 你可以把行李直接托运到终点。

phrases.tran_cn: 旅游胜地；旅游目的地；旅游景点

trans.tran_en: the place that someone or something is going to
